title: Carrot Cake
ingredients: Cake: 2 cups flour, 2 tsp baking soda, 2 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp salt, 1½ cups vegetable oil, 1½ cups sugar, 4 eggs, 3 cups finely grated carrots, 1 cup walnuts
Frosting: 16 oz cream cheese, ½ cup butter, 4 cups powdered sugar, 2 tsp vanilla
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease two 9-inch pans.
Whisk flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt.
Beat oil, sugar, eggs. Stir in dry ingredients.
Cool 10 minutes, turn out onto racks.
Frosting: Beat cream cheese and butter. Add sugar and vanilla.
